instructions: Open Health, then tap the Summary tab. Tap Show All Health Data. Tap Steps. Scroll Down until you find Data Sources & Access, then tap it. Touch and hold ios9-health-data-sources-device-move-order-icon.png next to a data source, then drag it up or down in the list. To turn off a data source so that it doesn't contribute any more data for that category, tap the checkmark next to the source. When you're finished, tap Done.
